story.Text: STEP 1: Hi! We are going for a treasure hunt. Treasure is very far from the bird. Let's get started...
Step 2: First of all check whether you have plugged the base module to the main module. You should be able to see 'Wheels' module under 'I Have' column.
STEP 3: Bird needs to go forward first. So drag and drop 'Go Forward' block.
STEP 4: Bird has to travel a time distance. So let's drag and drop 'Time is' block next to 'Until'.
STEP 5: Now we need to tell the time distance for the bird to fly. Click on the box and type 10 as above picture.
STEP 6: Now bird needs to turn right to fly towards the treasure. So let's drag and drop 'Turn Right' block.
STEP 7: Again bird needs to go forward. So let's drag and drop 'Go forward' block.
STEP 8: Bird has to travel a time distance. So let's drag and drop 'Time is' block next to 'Until'.
STEP 9: Now we need to tell the time distance for the bird to fly. Click on the box and type 20 as above picture.
Congratulations!!! You have completed Challenge - 3 successfully!
